name: Living Free Demo
description:
LIVING FREE

Versione: 0.7

I started developing it because I wanted to learn how to create a 2D game, but now I want to finish this game and make it multiplayer (coming soon).

this is a small game that i am developing in this quarantine, it is a 2D platform shooter where you have to survive as long as possible. In this version there are only 2 levels and the tutorial, because I update it constantly.

I hope you enjoy

Command:

  • A = Left;
  • D = Right;
  • Left Shift = SlowMotion;
  • Space = Jump;
  • Left Mouse = Shoot;
  • Right Mouse = Use GrappleGun;
  • E = Interract;
